title: Replace founder expertise content with pilot partnership messaging

requirements.text: Remove the content from the seven selected elements in section[5] that currently display founder Navy ET background, veteran-founded messaging, and multi-modal technology differentiation
acceptanceCriteria: All content in the seven selected elements (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[5]/div[2]/div[3]/div[1] through div[3]/div[2]) is removed
No Navy ET background messaging remains visible
No multi-modal technology differentiation content remains visible

requirements.text: Replace the removed content in the selected section[5] elements with two new messages: 'Seeking first pilot installation partners' and 'Pre-commercial prototype stage — be among the first'

quotes: replace with"Seeking first pilot installation partners" "Pre-commercial prototype stage — be among the first"

acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Seeking first pilot installation partners' is displayed in the selected section
The text 'Pre-commercial prototype stage — be among the first' is displayed in the selected section
Both messages use MOBIUS-NOVA brand typography and styling consistent with other landing page sections
The messages are arranged in a visually appealing layout within the existing section structure

constraints: Only modify the seven selected elements in section[5] of the landing page
Maintain MOBIUS-NOVA brand styling (Montserrat font, brand colors, typography guidelines)
Do not modify other sections of the landing page
nonGoals: Adding new sections beyond the selected area
Changing the overall page layout or structure
Modifying hero section, features section, benefits section, or footer
